data.title: Customized Connector Design
data.sub_title: Plug connector and raw cable for cardiac mapping
data.challenge: The umbilical cable assembly requires the 78-pin plug connector on both ends, and the cable and connectors must serve as a sturdy bridge for high - definition cardiac mapping capital equipment.

solutions.text: Customer has provided physical female connector samples with details. SINBON helps customer to redesign the plug connector and raw cable.

features.text: Customized design based on your prototype or sample.
Exclusive design pattern with 78 current plug.
Provide integrated solution with receptacle panel + umbilical cable + catheter connector.
